Start to Back Up or Restore your data.
One click is enough to backup or restore your data from one device to another.
Username does not exist, do you want to register it and backup your data?
Are you sure you want to backup your data? This will override your previously backed up data. This action may be irreversible.
Your data is backed up successfully.
Username does not exist, do you want to register it and backup your data instead?
Are you sure you want to restore your data? This will override all of your current configuration. This action may be irreversible.
